# Rankett - AI Visibility Platform for Agencies

> White-label AI visibility fulfillment for marketing agencies. Done-for-you optimization across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and more.

## What We Do
Rankett is a done-for-you AI visibility fulfillment platform. We help marketing agencies offer AI visibility optimization (AEO/GEO) as a white-labeled service to their clients. Agencies sell, we fulfill.

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://rankett.com
- Pricing: https://rankett.com/pricing
- Partner Program: https://rankett.com/partner
- FAQ: https://rankett.com/faq

## Services
- AI Visibility audits across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Claude, and Bing Chat
- Share of Voice (SOV) tracking across 50+ competitor queries
- Answer-first blog content creation
- Authority mention building (Featured.com, HARO, etc.)
- Technical implementation (schema markup, llms.txt, GBP optimization)
- White-label reporting and client dashboards
- Custom domain branding (aivisibility.youragency.com)

## Pricing
- Partner Access: $299/mo (unlimited audits, white-label platform, custom domain)
- Fulfillment Tier 1: $498/client/mo (50 queries, 8 blogs, schema, mentions)
- Fulfillment Tier 2: $1,498/client/mo (150 queries, 36 mentions, TLDR summaries)
- Fulfillment Tier 3: $2,498/client/mo (250 queries, 70+ mentions, YouTube, reports)
